string.name: about
string.pr:
This app is a news app in which we have
breaking news, we can save news and we can search for news
and share our news with friends and family.

string.name: how_to_use
string.pr:
We can use this app by scrolling through our news
and if we want to read complete article just click on it,
we can click the share button to share the news and heart
button to save our news into saved news tab.
We can delete our news by swiping it either left or right
in our shared news tab and search for any news in search news tab.
